beverages.name: Espresso
beverages.description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans.

beverages.name: Chai Latte
beverages.description: A spiced tea latte made from black tea, milk, and a blend of spices like cinnamon, cardamom, cloves, and ginger.

beverages.name: Coca-Cola
beverages.description: A carbonated soft drink with a distinct sweet flavor, primarily made from carbonated water, sugar, and flavorings.

beverages.name: Mojito
beverages.description: A refreshing cocktail made with white rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint leaves.

beverages.name: Green Tea
beverages.description: A type of tea made from Camellia sinensis leaves, not fermented like black tea, giving it a lighter flavor and color.

beverages.name: Orange Juice
beverages.description: A liquid extract of the orange tree fruit, known for its high vitamin C content and refreshing taste.

beverages.name: Beer
beverages.description: An alcoholic beverage typically made from fermented cereal grains, hops, yeast, and water.

beverages.name: Hot Chocolate
beverages.description: A warm beverage made from melted chocolate or cocoa powder, often mixed with milk and sugar.

beverages.name: Lemonade
beverages.description: A sweet and tangy beverage made from lemon juice, sugar, and water, served cold.

beverages.name: Wine
beverages.description: An alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes or other fruits, enjoyed in various flavors and colors.

beverages.name: Matcha Latte
beverages.description: A creamy beverage made from finely ground green tea powder mixed with steamed milk, offering a unique earthy flavor.

beverages.name: Smoothie
beverages.description: A thick beverage made from blended fruits, often combined with yogurt or milk for a creamy texture.

beverages.name: Lemon Iced Tea
beverages.description: A refreshing combination of brewed tea, lemon juice, and sugar, served chilled over ice.

beverages.name: Margarita
beverages.description: A popular cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec, served in a glass rimmed with salt.

beverages.name: Coconut Water
beverages.description: A clear liquid extracted from green coconuts, known for its natural sweetness and hydrating properties.

beverages.name: Cappuccino
beverages.description: A coffee-based drink with a rich espresso base, topped with steamed milk and a frothy milk foam.

beverages.name: Whiskey
beverages.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash, typically aged in wooden casks.

beverages.name: Rooibos Tea
beverages.description: A caffeine-free herbal tea made from the leaves of the Aspalathus linearis plant, known for its red color and sweet taste.

beverages.name: Pina Colada
beverages.description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice, often garnished with a pineapple slice.

beverages.name: Hot Toddy
beverages.description: A warm drink made by mixing whiskey with honey, lemon juice, and hot water, often enjoyed during cold weather.

beverages.name: Bubble Tea
beverages.description: A unique tea-based drink with chewy tapioca pearls, often blended with milk and sweeteners.

beverages.name: Iced Coffee
beverages.description: Chilled coffee served over ice, often sweetened and sometimes mixed with milk or cream.

beverages.name: Sangria
beverages.description: A refreshing Spanish wine-based cocktail mixed with fruits, brandy, and sweeteners.

beverages.name: Kombucha
beverages.description: A fermented tea beverage known for its probiotic benefits and effervescence, often flavored with fruits or herbs.

beverages.name: Mint Julep
beverages.description: A classic Southern cocktail made with bourbon, fresh mint leaves, and sugar, served over crushed ice.

beverages.name: Lassi
beverages.description: A traditional Indian drink made by blending yogurt with water and spices or fruits, offering a refreshing taste.

beverages.name: Gin and Tonic
beverages.description: A simple yet classic cocktail made by combining gin with tonic water, garnished with a lime wedge.

beverages.name: Horchata
beverages.description: A sweet, milky drink made from ground almonds, sesame seeds, rice, or barley, often flavored with cinnamon.

beverages.name: Tequila Sunrise
beverages.description: A vibrant cocktail made with tequila, orange juice, and a splash of grenadine, creating a sunrise-like gradient.

beverages.name: Earl Grey Tea
beverages.description: A black tea blend flavored with oil of bergamot, offering a citrusy aroma and flavor.

beverages.name: Irish Coffee
beverages.description: A warm coffee-based cocktail made with Irish whiskey, sugar, and topped with thick cream.

beverages.name: Arnold Palmer
beverages.description: A refreshing drink made from a combination of iced tea and lemonade, named after the legendary golfer.

beverages.name: Prosecco
beverages.description: A light and bubbly Italian sparkling wine, known for its fruity and floral aromas.

beverages.name: Hot Toddy
beverages.description: A soothing beverage made with whiskey, hot water, honey, and lemon, often consumed as a remedy for colds.

beverages.name: Mai Tai
beverages.description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and orange liqueur, garnished with mint and fruit.

beverages.name: Sake
beverages.description: A traditional Japanese rice wine, enjoyed both warm and chilled, with various flavors and aromas.

beverages.name: Pisco Sour
beverages.description: A popular Peruvian cocktail made with pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and frothy egg white, often garnished with bitters.

beverages.name: Ginger Beer
beverages.description: A carbonated soft drink flavored primarily with ginger, offering a spicy and sweet taste.

beverages.name: Chai Tea
beverages.description: A spiced tea beverage made by brewing black tea with a blend of aromatic Indian spices and milk.

beverages.name: Aperol Spritz
beverages.description: A vibrant Italian cocktail made with Aperol, prosecco, and a splash of soda water, served over ice.

beverages.name: Moscow Mule
beverages.description: A refreshing cocktail made with vodka, spicy ginger beer, and a splash of lime juice, traditionally served in a copper mug.

beverages.name: Tea Latte
beverages.description: A creamy beverage combining steeped tea with steamed milk and sweeteners, available in various tea flavors.

beverages.name: Negroni
beverages.description: A classic Italian cocktail made with gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth, garnished with an orange peel.

beverages.name: Lavender Lemonade
beverages.description: A floral twist on traditional lemonade, infused with fragrant lavender syrup for a unique and refreshing flavor.

beverages.name: Sangria
beverages.description: A fruity Spanish cocktail made with red wine, mixed fruits, brandy, and a splash of soda, served chilled.

beverages.name: Matcha Latte
beverages.description: A vibrant green tea-based latte made by whisking high-quality matcha powder with steamed milk and sweeteners.

beverages.name: Cider
beverages.description: A fermented apple beverage, available in various styles from sweet to dry, enjoyed particularly during autumn.

beverages.name: Thai Iced Tea
beverages.description: A sweet and creamy iced tea beverage made with strong black tea, sweetened condensed milk, and served over ice.

beverages.name: Bellini
beverages.description: A refreshing Italian cocktail made with sparkling Prosecco wine and peach purée, originating from Venice.

beverages.name: Horlicks
beverages.description: A malted milk hot drink, rich in vitamins and minerals, known for its creamy and slightly sweet flavor.

beverages.name: Mojito
beverages.description: A refreshing Cuban cocktail made with white rum, fresh mint leaves, lime juice, sugar, and topped with soda water.

beverages.name: Iced Matcha Latte
beverages.description: A chilled version of the traditional Matcha Latte, blending high-quality matcha powder with cold milk, sweetener, and ice.

beverages.name: Gin Fizz
beverages.description: A classic American cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, sugar, and soda water, served over ice.

beverages.name: Turmeric Latte (Golden Milk)
beverages.description: A warm and comforting drink from India, made with turmeric, milk, honey, and spices, known for its health benefits.

beverages.name: Caipirinha
beverages.description: Brazil's national cocktail, made with cachaça (a distilled spirit made from sugarcane juice), muddled lime, and sugar.

beverages.name: Oolong Tea
beverages.description: A traditional Chinese tea variety with characteristics between green and black tea, known for its unique flavor profile.

beverages.name: Rum Punch
beverages.description: A fruity Caribbean cocktail made with rum, various fruit juices, sweetener, and a touch of spices, served chilled.

beverages.name: Hot Cocoa
beverages.description: A comforting beverage made from cocoa powder, milk, and sugar, often topped with marshmallows or whipped cream.

beverages.name: Pimm's Cup
beverages.description: A classic English summer cocktail made with Pimm's No. 1, lemonade, fresh fruits, and mint, served over ice.

beverages.name: Masala Chai
beverages.description: A flavorful Indian tea made with black tea leaves, aromatic spices, milk, and sweetener, offering a rich and spicy taste.

beverages.name: Sazerac
beverages.description: A classic New Orleans cocktail made with rye whiskey, absinthe, sugar, and aromatic bitters, garnished with a lemon peel.

beverages.name: Rose Tea
beverages.description: A fragrant tea made by infusing dried rose petals or buds, known for its delicate floral aroma and light taste.

beverages.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
beverages.description: A refreshing Bermudian cocktail made with dark rum, spicy ginger beer, and a squeeze of lime, served over ice.

beverages.name: Vanilla Rooibos Tea
beverages.description: A caffeine-free herbal tea from South Africa, combining rooibos leaves with natural vanilla flavor for a smooth and sweet taste.

beverages.name: Paloma
beverages.description: A popular Mexican cocktail made with tequila, grapefruit soda, lime juice, and a salted rim, often garnished with a lime wedge.

beverages.name: Peppermint Mocha
beverages.description: A festive coffee beverage combining espresso, steamed milk, peppermint syrup, and chocolate, often enjoyed during the holiday season.

beverages.name: Mimosa
beverages.description: A classic French cocktail made with champagne and chilled orange juice, typically served in a tall champagne flute.

beverages.name: Chamomile Tea
beverages.description: A calming herbal tea made from dried chamomile flowers, known for its soothing properties and mild, floral flavor.

beverages.name: Pisco Sour
beverages.description: A popular Peruvian cocktail made with pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, frothy egg white, and a dash of Angostura bitters.

beverages.name: Lemon Ginger Tea
beverages.description: A warming tea blend combining black tea, fresh ginger, lemon slices, and honey, offering a zesty and soothing experience.
